CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 24, 1954, pg. 12, reads: "Easter Parade - The beautiful weather Sunday drew thousands of devout church-goers to their respective edifices to worship. And it also draw a glamorous parade of charming maids and matrons, bedecked in Easter finery.  Teenie Harris and Oceania Sockwell covered some fifteen churches to get the above photos...No. 11: Central Baptist's church-goers included the family of its pastor, the Rev. Cornell E. Talley.  Pictured, Willette Bynum, Cornell Talley Jr., Mrs. C.E. Talley, Mrs. Juanita Bates, Mrs. Gladys Beverly, Mrs. E. Major, Mrs. L. Pullum and George Talley."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of members of family of Rev. Cornell Talley including: Willette Bynum, Cornell Talley Jr., MarthaTalley, Juanita Bates, Gladys Beverly, Mrs. E. Major, Mrs. L. Pullum, and George Talley, standing in front of Central Baptist Church on Easter Sunday
